Ibrahima Kébé (Kaolack, October 2, 1955 , September 8, 2019) bụ onye Senegal na-ese ihe Soninke
O biri ruo mgbe ọ nwụrụ na Village des Arts de Dakar
A mụrụ Ibrahima Kébé na Kaolack, Senegal na October 2, 1955
Kébé gụrụ akwụkwọ na School of Fine Arts na Dakar.
Ihe osise ya lekwasịrị anya na ndụ kwa ụbọchị
O nwekwara ihe ngosi na Senegal, Belgium, na Germany.
Ọ bi na Village des Arts na Dakar.
